spas.taglib.printers

Class PrintCourse

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      • spas.taglib.printers.PrintCourse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag

    public class PrintCourse
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
    Prints out course given as GET-parameters (name and id). If information was not given, it redirects user to welcome.jsp, otherwise prints it out in a table containing information about it. Also adds a remove/add button accordingly and handles it. Now also adds edit form for course, if it's added.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti
    See Also:
    NReader, UserCourseHandler, Serialized Form
